columns.authID: The unique identifier for each author.
columns.fname: The first name of the author.
columns.lname: The last name of the author.

Authors.table_description: The table stores unique details about authors.

columns.paperID: The unique identifier for each paper.
columns.title: The title of the research paper.

Papers.table_description: The table stores unique details about research papers.

columns.instID: The unique identifier for each institution.
columns.name: The official name of the institution.
columns.country: The country where the institution is located.

Inst.table_description: The table stores unique details about various institutions.

columns.authID: The unique identifier for each author involved in a paper.
columns.instID: The unique identifier for each institution associated with an author.
columns.paperID: The unique identifier for each paper authored.
columns.authOrder: The order of the author in the list of contributors.

Authorship.table_description: The table details the relationships between authors, institutions, and papers.
